programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Cinema icon Al Pacino joins a powerhouse cast headed by of George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia, Don Cheadle, Bernie Mac, and series newcomer Ellen Barkin for this, the third installment of director Steven Soderbergh's popular series of glitzy crime comedies. The only hotelier in Las Vegas who can claim that each and every one of his establishments has earned the Royal Review Board's Five Diamond Award, Willy Bank (Pacino) has made more than his share of enemies during his impressive ascent. While most of Bank's adversaries amount to little more than the occasional nuisance, however, this powerful player is about to find out that picking your enemies in Las Vegas can be a true gamble. In betraying Reuben Tishkoff (Elliott Gould), Bank has finally crossed the one man who could bring his entire empire crumbling to the ground -- Danny Ocean (Clooney). Now Reuben is in critical condition, and Ocean is determined to strike back at the man who nearly murdered his mentor. Bank may have taken down one of the original Ocean's Eleven, but his efforts only managed to unite the remaining ten closer than ever before. As the opening of Bank's newest casino draws near, Danny and the crew set into motion a bold plan to humiliate the cocksure casino owner and forever tarnish his spotless reputation. It won't be easy, but if Ocean and his team can get their elaborate plan together in time for the opening of The Bank, they just might be able to deliver some serious Las Vegas justice

programme.desc: The thirty-something owner of a used-record store takes stock of his sorry excuse for a love life after his latest girlfriend leaves him

programme.title: Amy Schumer: Live at the Apollo
programme.desc: Comedian Amy Schumer performs in New York City at the Apollo Theater. Directed by Chris Rock(n)

programme.title: Appropriate Behavior
programme.desc: In this utterly unique comedy, a bisexual woman from a staunchly traditional Persian family attempts to determine why her last relationship failed. Meanwhile, she stages silent acts of rebellion in response to her brother's recent engagement(n)

programme.title: Wagons East!
programme.desc: Tired of frontier living, a group of pioneers decide to give up and go home in this comedy. Unfortunately, they are saddled with a drunken, bumbling wagon-master, and are soon under attack from gunslingers hired by a group of pro-frontier railroad barons who want to keep them from reaching home(n)

programme.title: The Ladies' Man
programme.desc: Sight gags are the show as Jerry Lewis clowns it up as a houseboy in a women's boardinghouse. Helen Welenmelon: Helen Traubel. Fay: Pat Stanley. Katie: Kathleen Freeman. Directed by Lewis(n)

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Those lovable chubby-cheeked chipmunks Alivin, Simon and Theodore make their big screen debut in this entertaining tale of how they met mentor and father figure Dave. Forced to move after their home becomes a christmas tree for a record company, they move into Dave's home without his knowledge. He's not too thrilled to have rodents in his kitchen, but when he hears them sing he realises he might have found a way to rejuvenate his career - and make them stars! Listen out for the voice of Criminal Minds star Matthew Gray Gubler as Simon(n)

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Congressman Evan Baxter is settling into a new life of political importance when God appears and tells him to build an ark. Evan thinks he's going mad, but before long, animals and deliveries of wood persuade him that it might be his destiny to be the modern-day Noah after all(n)

programme.title: Fathers' Day
programme.desc: The stage is set for comedy when two middle-aged men (Billy Crystal and Robin Williams) struggle to overcome their considerable differences to find the runaway son of the ex-lover who has just informed them that one of them is the boy's father(n)

programme.title: Thunderbirds
programme.desc: Disappointing but visually arresting live-action adaptation of a British-TV puppet fantasy from the '60s. It follows a family of space-age heroes battling evil(n)

programme.title: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
programme.desc: When Texas authorities attempt to close down the Chicken Ranch, a popular Texas brothel, the local madam fights to save her business—singing and dancing all the way(n)

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: In this throwback monster movie from producer Dean Devlin (Independence Day, Godzilla), David Arquette plays the son of a deceased mine owner, returning home to the economically depressed hamlet of Prosperity, AZ, after a long absence. His arrival coincides with a toxic waste accident in the local water supply, the result of a barrel jostled loose from the back of a passing truck. Unfortunately, said water source abuts the region's least-popular attraction: an exotic spider farm. The farm's owner (Tom Noonan) becomes the first victim when the spiders, already possessed of keen predatory abilities, grow to the size of small automobiles. Laying in wait underground, they begin picking off the town's pet and ostrich population, and soon it's all the local sheriff (Kari Wuhrer) can do to raise the alarm before the siege begins. Eight Legged Freaks was produced under the working title "Arac Attack," but the politically conscious producers, concerned the title sounded too much like "Iraq Attack," went with Arquette's brainstorm as a safer alternative(n)

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: Teen comedy sequel in which a group of friends are reunited after their freshman year of college and embark upon a series of comical adventures when they rent a summer house on Lake Michigan(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Trainwreck'
programme.desc: A look at "Trainwreck," a 2015 comedy about a commitment-phobic woman who finds herself falling for the subject of an article she's writing for a men's magazine. The film stars Amy Schumer, Bill Hader and Tilda Swinton, and is written by Schumer and directed by Judd Apatow(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher

programme.title: National Lampoon's Van Wilder
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds plays the eponymous hero in Walter Becker's comedy, now in his seventh year at college and whose mission in life is to help all the undergrads have a good time (and in the case of the girls, join him in bed). When his father withdraws his funding our hero is forced to earn his money organising pay parties. They're so successful that the college paper gets interested, but if his secret gets out, he'll be expelled. Can he persuade reporter Tara Reid (currently guest starring in Scrubs on Channel 4 Friday nights) that what he does serves a useful purpose on campus?(n)

programme.title: Two Brothers
programme.desc: Two tiger cubs are captured and their parents shot dead. One ends up a whimpering circus performer, the other a ferocious caged beast. Then they are pitted against each other for sport

programme.title: Making of 'Jurassic World'
programme.desc: A look at "Jurassic World" (2015), the fourth installment in the "Jurassic Park" series that unfolds 22 years after the 1993 original and features a new dinosaur theme park on Isla Nubar. The film stars Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard and Vincent D'Onofrio, and is directed by Colin Trevorrow

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Divine comedy sequel to 2003's "Bruce Almighty." A hilarious Steve Carell reprises his role as newscaster (now Congressman) Evan Baxter, who's summoned by God to build an ark. Morgan Freeman once again takes on the role of the deity. Directed by Tom Shadyac, who also helmed the original. Lauren Graham costars as Evan's disbelieving wife. Wanda Sykes, John Goodman, Molly Shannon, John Michael Higgins

programme.title: The Cup
programme.desc: Phar Lap director Simon Wincer returns to the world of horse racing with this inspirational true story about one man's quest to pay tribute to his fallen brother by winning the Melbourne Cup. The sons of legendary jockey Ray Oliver -- who was killed during a horse race in Western Australia -- Damien (Stephen Curry) and Jason Oliver (Daniel MacPherson) followed in their father's footsteps by becoming champion riders. But in the run-up to the prestigious Melbourne Cup, a tragedy on the track kills Jason, and leaves his brother deeply shaken. Initially doubting he will ever find the courage to ride again, Damien summons the courage to compete in the Melbourne Cup and honor his brother's memory with the help of Dermot Weld (Brendan Gleeson), a celebrated horse trainer from Ireland who's convinced Damien has the makings of a true champion. Later, as Damien and his horse Media Puzzle approach the starting line, race fans from around the world cheer them on

programme.title: Camp Nowhere
programme.desc: This light-hearted comedy depicts a typical summer camp, but with a special twist: this camp was designed by the campers themselves! "Mud" Himmel is a nerd. Once again he is faced with attending computer camp. His buddy Zack will be marching into go to military camp while Trish is acting happy about theater camp. That Gaby is going again to fat camp weighs heavily upon her mind. None of them are thrilled with their camp prospects and it is rebellious Mud who suggest that they create their own, secret camp. Enter Dennis Van Welker, their crazy high school drama instructor. He offers to join the conspiracy and act as their camp counselor. Just as it looks as if the four misfits are going to have a really great summer together, two dozen of their peers find out about the camp and decide to come along. For a time it's one big chaotic party. But as the kids act out their camp fantasies, they are gaining valuable insight into their lives

programme.title: Like Mike 2: Streetball
programme.desc: Forget about the arena, because in this sequel to the 2002 slam-dunk basketball hit Like Mike, it's all about the quest to become the King of Concrete. Jerome Jenkins Jr. is a pint-sized street-ball player with larger-than-life dreams of dominating the open-air court. Vertically challenged, uncoordinated, and decidedly lacking in speed, Jerome fails to earn the respect of his peers on the court until he discovers a mysterious pair of sneakers that instill him with the power to make his dreams of winning become reality. Now, as Jerome's newfound talents send him rocketing to street stardom and his swelling ego eclipses his youthful sense of wonder, it's up to the street-ball superstar's family and friends to show him what it really means to be a winner on the court as well as off

programme.title: Jonas Brothers: The Concert Experience
programme.desc: A 3-D concert film of the 2008 Jonas Brothers Burning Up concert tour, as well as documentary footage on the lives of the three brothers

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Divine comedy sequel to 2003's "Bruce Almighty." A hilarious Steve Carell reprises his role as newscaster (now Congressman) Evan Baxter, who's summoned by God to build an ark. Morgan Freeman once again takes on the role of the deity. Directed by Tom Shadyac, who also helmed the original. Lauren Graham costars as Evan's disbelieving wife. Wanda Sykes, John Goodman, Molly Shannon, John Michael Higgins

programme.title: Dr. Dolittle 2
programme.desc: In this so-so sequel, the good doctor (Eddie Murphy) tries to mate two endangered bears to save a forest marked for destruction. The animals are funny; the plot standard; the humor broad. Voice talent features Norm Macdonald, Steve Zahn and Lisa Kudrow

programme.title: Like Mike
programme.desc: Pint-size rap music star Lil Bow Wow shows that he can play ball as well as he raps in this youth-oriented comedy about a young boy whose dream comes true in an unexpected way. Calvin Cambridge (Lil Bow Wow) is a 14-year-old boy, who, since the death of his parents, has been living in an orphanage run by the unpleasantly eccentric Stan Bittleman (Crispin Glover). While the tough but caring Sister Theresa (Anne Meara) tries to encourage the kids, Calvin knows that he and most of the other kids his age are poor prospects for adoption. Calvin loves basketball and idolizes Michael Jordan, but he's too short to be much of a challenge to the older kids when shooting hoop at the playground. One day, Calvin discovers a pair of old basketball sneakers with the initials "MJ" written on the inside. Calvin is convinced they once belonged to Michael Jordan, but he can hardly believe what happens when he puts them on -- suddenly he's able to make superhuman jump shots and dunks just like a miniature version of Air Jordan himself. Calvin's newly developed talent on the court comes to the attention of Frank Bernard (Eugene Levy), the manager of the Los Angeles Knights, an NBA team having a humiliating season. Bernard brings Calvin to the team as a novelty item, but with the help of Coach Wagner (Robert Forster) and the new kid's can-do attitude, the Knights start to climb out of the cellar and look like possible season champs. However, Tracey Reynolds (Morris Chestnut), who used to be the team's star player, isn't happy to have his thunder stolen by a 14-year-old boy -- especially when he's made Calvin's roommate and de-facto guardian on the road. Like Mike also features cameo appearances by a number of pro basketball stars, including Allen Iverson, Chris Webber, and Jason Kidd

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: A variety of horrible poisonous spiders get exposed to a noxious chemical that causes them to grow to monumental proportions

programme.title: Project Nim
programme.desc: Documentary about Nim Chimpsky, the chimpanzee who in the 1970s became the focus of a landmark experiment which aimed to show that an ape could learn to communicate with language if raised and nurtured like a human child. Following Nim's extraordinary journey through human society, and the enduring impact he makes on the people he meets along the way, the film is an unflinching and unsentimental biography of an animal we tried to make human.Dir: James Marsh(n)

programme.title: What's Up, Doc?
programme.desc: Two researchers have come to San Francisco to compete for a research grant in Music. One seems a bit distracted, and that's before he meets her. A strange woman seems to have devoted her life to confusing and embarassing him. She gets him involved with crooks and a series of accidents(n)

programme.title: Not Another Teen Movie
programme.desc: Jake Wyler is an all-American jock who bets that he can turn the cute-ugly duckling Janey Briggs into a prom queen

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: In this offbeat detective story set in 1970 California, a drug-addled private eye investigates a conspiracy involving his ex-flame and her married, real-estate-developer boyfriend. Meanwhile, various eccentric characters complicate the investigation

programme.title: American Splendor
programme.desc: (2003) Harvey Pekar (Paul Giamatti) is a hospital filing clerk with a penchant for rare jazz records and otherwise, well, a pretty dead-end life. But he becomes famous through his friendship with cartoonist Robert Crumb (James Urbaniak), who takes Harvey's stickman-illustrated musings on his everyday life and turns them into one of America's most successful cult comic books. Shari Springer Berman and Robert Pulcini's film mixes drama, animation and interjections from the real-life Pekar in this genuinely unique Oscar-nominated, Sundance-winning comedy-drama. M,W,R,S

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent has his hands full when a jet cargo of creepy-crawly critters is unleashed on passengers by a mob boss trying to do away with a murder witness

programme.title: Raising Arizona
programme.desc: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives get more complicated than they anticipated

programme.title: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
programme.desc: The Fantastic Four learn that they aren't the only super-powered beings in the universe when they square off against the powerful Silver Surfer and the planet-eating Galactus

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: The Barden Bellas are back, determined to enter (and win) an international competition. After a disasterous performance elsewhere, the Bellas have much more to prove if they want to become the best

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: In this hip reboot of the comic-book franchise, a brilliant scientist builds a device that allows users to teleport to an alternate dimension, but an experiment involving it goes wrong and leaves him and his three teammates with unusual superpowers. The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Mickey Rourke is a fading pro-wrestler struggling to adjust to life outside the ring in this Oscar-winning 2008 movie

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Four working class stiffs pool their money for a high stakes card game, but things go wrong and they end up owing half a million pounds to the wrong people!

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: An orphan boy discovers his destiny as Peter Pan, and is whisked away to an enchanted land to battle the fearsome pirate Blackbeard with the help of the warrior woman Tiger Lily(r)

programme.title: A Walk Among the Tombstones
programme.desc: A heroin trafficker whose wife was abducted and murdered hires a haunted private investigator to track down the men who killed her in this brooding crime drama starring Liam Neeson. Matt Scudder (Neeson) was an NYPD cop having a quiet drink in a Washington Heights bar when a pair of armed robbers came in guns blazing. Giving chase, Scudder kills the robbers in the street, though a stray bullet turns a heroic moment tragic. Devastated, Scudder subsequently goes to work as an unlicensed private detective, working just outside of the law and surviving on generous gifts offered in exchange for his services. Now, tasked with rooting out the sadistic thugs who brutally murdered the wife of a wealthy drug dealer (Dan Stevens), Scudder scours the bars and back alleys of New York City in search of his elusive targets -- and the closer he gets, the more apparent it becomes that they are something much more sinister than your typical kidnappers

programme.title: Into the Blue 2: The Reef
programme.desc: Two professional divers are hired to search for lost treasure, but soon discover their employers' motives to be much more sinister than first thought(n)

programme.title: Renegades
programme.desc: Young Guns co-stars Kiefer Sutherland and Lou Diamond Philips star respectively as a renegade cop and an American-Indian who must put aside their various differences and team up in order to catch a brutal criminal who has made off with a $2million hoard of diamonds and a priceless ancient Indian artefact. Breakneck action scenes and the chemistry between the two young leads highlight this fast-paced cop thriller(n)

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Ice Cube stars in this slick comedy-drama about a day in the life of the cutups who work and hang out at a barbershop on Chicago's South Side. Cube plays Calvin Palmer, an entrepreneurial soul who inherits his father's struggling hair business. Unfortunately, Calvin doesn't want to be the head honcho, so he sells the shop to a local loan shark---a move that greatly upsets his regulars. Cedric the Entertainer(n)

programme.title: Broad Street Bullies
programme.desc: Documentary on the Philadelphia Flyers of the 1970s and the aggressive style of play that won them back-to-back Stanley Cups. Beloved in their home city and despised elsewhere, the Flyers were one of the most polarizing champions in sports. Among those interviewed are Bobby Clarke; Bill Barber; Dave Schultz; Bill Clement; and Gary Dornhoefer(n)

programme.title: Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: Adventure story about a team of scientists who find themselves at the mercy of genetically modified sharks. A millionaire hoping to find a cure for brain diseases establishes a research programme on a lab at sea. As part of this research, a doctor begins experimenting on sharks, causing them to mutate and become intelligent and highly aggressive. Soon the humans and sharks are locked in a deadly battle for survival(n)

programme.title: Cry-Baby
programme.desc: A parody of 1950s teen musicals involving a bad boy who falls for a rich girl(n)

programme.title: Transamerica
programme.desc: Duncan Tucker's film stars Oscar-nominated, Golden Globe-winner Felicity Huffman as Sabrina 'Bree' Osbourne, a man who is preparing to undergo the final part of sex change surgery. Until her therapist, who can authorise the final operation, drops a bombshell. As Stanley, she fathered a son, Toby, who is now a teenage male prostitute and in trouble with the law. Before Bree can have the final operation, she must meet up with him and resolve both his problems and her feelings. Bailing him out in New York, she agrees to drive him to L.A. and on the road, they learn about each other as Toby tries to accept both his father... and his mother(n)

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: In this creepy prequel to hit horror The Conjuring, a couple are tormented by a doll that has been possessed by an evil spirit(n)

programme.title: Entourage
programme.desc: In this raunchy satire based on the hit HBO series, young Hollywood A-lister Vincent Chase (Adrian Grenier) and his posse of best buds (Kevin Connolly, Jerry Ferrara and Kevin Dillon) negotiate the perils and pleasures of Hollywood life, with the help of superagent Ari Gold (Jeremy Piven)(n)

programme.title: Lost River
programme.desc: A financially strapped single mother descends into a dark world in order to protect her family. Meanwhile, her son confronts the town bully and discovers a hidden utopia(n)

programme.title: Friday Night Lights
programme.desc: High school coach Gary has some of the best high school players in Texas. But when his star running back is injured in Game Two, can he inspire the team to victory?(n)

programme.title: Transamerica
programme.desc: Duncan Tucker's film stars Oscar-nominated, Golden Globe-winner Felicity Huffman as Sabrina 'Bree' Osbourne, a man who is preparing to undergo the final part of sex change surgery. Until her therapist, who can authorise the final operation, drops a bombshell. As Stanley, she fathered a son, Toby, who is now a teenage male prostitute and in trouble with the law. Before Bree can have the final operation, she must meet up with him and resolve both his problems and her feelings. Bailing him out in New York, she agrees to drive him to L.A. and on the road, they learn about each other as Toby tries to accept both his father... and his mother(n)

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends open themselves up to a terrifying ordeal when they attempt to summon spirits through a Ouija board(n)

programme.title: Lost River
programme.desc: A spellbinding fantasy about a financially strapped single mother who descends into a dark world in order to protect her family, while her son confronts the town bully and discovers a hidden utopia

programme.title: Standing Still
programme.desc: When a diverse group of lifelong friends comes together to celebrate the marriage of devoted couple Elise (Amy Adams) and Michael (Adam Garcia), the mixed-up relationships of the past pave the road to a weekend no one is likely to soon forget in the feature debut from filmmaker Matthew Cole Weiss. The setting is Los Angeles, CA, and the event is the wedding between a man and a woman who always seemed destined to be together. Unfortunately, all relationships can't be as healthy as Elise and Michael's is, and though best man and maid of honor Rich (Aaron Stanford) and Samantha (Melissa Sagemiller) seem to be preparing to take the plunge, the same certainly cannot be said for neurotic actress Lana (Mena Suvari). A free-spirited soul who has experienced flings with a variety of wedding attendees including the hapless Pockets (Jon Abrahams), alcoholic actor Simon (James Van Der Beek), and manic children's television program host Donovan (Ethan Embry), Lana attempts to sort out her past flings as lovelorn agent Quentin (Colin Hanks) pines for the bride's sister and the estranged father of the groom attempts to reconnect with his long-lost son

programme.title: Georgia Rule
programme.desc: Powerhouse performances by Jane Fonda, Felicity Huffman and Lindsay Lohan spark this touching and bittersweet saga of three generations of family members dealing with past and present problems, including rape, addictions and promiscuity. Directed by Garry Marshall

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town teen's singing video goes viral and catapults her and her sister's band into global superstardom, but their newfound fame threatens to break apart their familial bonds

programme.title: Far From the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: An adaptation of Thomas Hardy's seminal novel about a beautiful but headstrong woman who attracts three very different male suitors throughout her life in Victorian England

programme.title: A Perfect Murder
programme.desc: Millionaire industrialist Steven Taylor is a man who has everything but what he craves most, the love and the fidelity of his wife. A hugely successful player in the financial world, he considers her to be his most treasured acquisition. But she needs more than the role of a dazzling accessory. Brilliant in her own right, she is involved with a struggling artist who fulfills her emotional needs. Her husband discovers her indiscretion and sets out to commit the perfect murder

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: The Beach. An eight-part drama series following a murder case in New York City. In the opener, a perfect night for a Pakistani-American student turns into a nightmare when he is arrested for murder

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: Adapted from the young adult novel by John Green, Fox 2000's Paper Towns tells the story of the bizarre mystery that unfolds in the wake of an acute youthful trauma. After stumbling across the body of a suicide victim, two young neighbors gradually begin to drift apart. Years later, the girl appears at the boy's window in a ninja costume, and requests his help in punishing those who were cruel to her. The following day she disappears without a trace, leaving him in a state of emotional flux as he follows a bizarre trail of clues in hopes of tracking her down

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: Donald Trump's legal battles; Trump University; and the debt-buying industry are discussed

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: (2007) Jason Reitman's comedy drama stars Oscar-nominee Ellen Page as Juno McGuff, 16 and pregnant after an encounter with sometime boyfriend Paulie Bleeker (Michael Cera). She tells her father Mac and stepmother Bren (JK Simmons and Allison Janney) she intends to have the baby and then hand it over for adoption. In the pages of the PennySaver, she finds childless couple Vanessa and Mark Loring (Jennifer Garner and Jason Bateman) who look like the ideal couple. But, as the months progress and her stomach swells, Juno begins to doubt both them and her course of action. Oscar-winning Diablo Cody's whip-smart script keeps the laughs coming and the action moving in one of the most lauded movies of recent years

programme.title: Dead Poets Society
programme.desc: Drama about an unconventional new English teacher and his ultimately questionable impact on an elite Vermont boys' academy. Robin Williams, in a straight role, blows into the stuffy halls of academe like a breath of fresh air, startling colleagues and delighting boys with his disdain for traditional teaching methods and text books. But the seeds of rebellion he sows have far-reaching effects that he never intended

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: The Beach. An eight-part drama series following a murder case in New York City. In the opener, a perfect night for a Pakistani-American student turns into a nightmare when he is arrested for murder

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, an intelligent but self-conscious deskbound CIA analyst (Melissa McCarthy) is finally given the chance to go undercover as a homely "cat lady" in order to save her missing partner (Jude Law) and thwart a global disaster at the hands of a dangerous arms dealer. Written and directed by Paul Feig

programme.title: A Perfect Murder
programme.desc: Millionaire industrialist Steven Taylor is a man who has everything but what he craves most, the love and the fidelity of his wife. A hugely successful player in the financial world, he considers her to be his most treasured acquisition. But she needs more than the role of a dazzling accessory. Brilliant in her own right, she is involved with a struggling artist who fulfills her emotional needs. Her husband discovers her indiscretion and sets out to commit the perfect murder

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: Taut drama about an ambitious young stockbroker who is seduced by money and power when he hooks up with a high-powered company trader. But he faces a crisis of conscience when he discovers the truth behind the trader's bid to buy up an airline for which his father is a union rep. Michael Douglas won an Oscar for Best Actor for his portrayal of Gordon Gekko - the personification of 80s greed(n)

programme.title: Suicide Kings
programme.desc: In this hip crime drama, a spoiled rich teen's (Henry Thomas) sister is abducted, and he and his punk friends decide to kidnap an ex-mob boss (Christopher Walken) as a negotiating tool. But the wily mobster turns the tables on his bungling captors. Denis Leary, Sean Patrick Flanery, Jay Mohr, Jeremy Sisto, Laura San Giacomo(n)

programme.title: Becoming Mike Nichols
programme.desc: A compilation of discussions between director Mike Nichols (1931-2014) and his colleague Jack O'Brien includes the former's recollections of his early career in show business, including his comedy performances with Elaine May in the late 1950s; stage directions of "Barefoot in the Park" (1963) and "The Odd Couple" (1965); and making the films "Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?" (1966) and "The Graduate" (1967). The interviews were filmed at the Golden Theatre in New York City in July 2014(n)

programme.title: Keeping the Faith
programme.desc: Comedy drama in which two childhood friends who have both grown up with religious vocations, one as a Catholic priest and one as a rabbi, fall for the same woman. Their religious commitments should prevent either of them from pursuing the relationship, but the temptation puts a strain on their vocations as well as their friendship(n)

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: Profiles of men and women in New York City who struggle to eke out a living by collecting bottles and cans to redeem at recycling centers for five cents apiece. An Oscar nominee for Best Documentary Short film(n)

programme.title: Trouble With the Curve
programme.desc: An ailing baseball scout is given one last chance to prove his competence - and to reconnect with his daughter - on a scouting trip to North Carolina. Drama(n)

programme.title: Mildred Pierce
programme.desc: Part One. In the first part of this five-part adaptation of James M. Cain's 1941 novel, Depression-era housewife Mildred Pierce searches for work to maintain a middle-class lifestyle after her husband leaves her with two young daughters in Glendale, California(n)

programme.title: Mildred Pierce
programme.desc: Part Two. Set in Depression-era California, this absorbing drama follows tenacious single mother Mildred as she strives to make ends meet after the breakdown of her marriage. Forced to take a job as a waitress, Mildred's baking skills quickly give her humble status a boost, but she soon realsies that the approval of her snooty daugher Veda (Morgan Turner/Evan Rachel Wood) is impossible to acquire(n)

programme.title: Mildred Pierce
programme.desc: Part Three. Set in Depression-era California, this absorbing drama follows tenacious single mother Mildred as she strives to make ends meet after the breakdown of her marriage. Forced to take a job as a waitress, Mildred's baking skills quickly give her humble status a boost, but she soon realsies that the approval of her snooty daugher Veda (Morgan Turner/Evan Rachel Wood) is impossible to acquire(n)

programme.title: Mildred Pierce
programme.desc: Part Four. Set in Depression-era California, this absorbing drama follows tenacious single mother Mildred as she strives to make ends meet after the breakdown of her marriage. Forced to take a job as a waitress, Mildred's baking skills quickly give her humble status a boost, but she soon realsies that the approval of her snooty daugher Veda (Morgan Turner/Evan Rachel Wood) is impossible to acquire(n)

programme.title: Mildred Pierce
programme.desc: Part Five. Conclusion. Mildred marries Monty and buys his Pasadena mansion, but imprudent financial moves get her in trouble with the restaurant's investors, and her reconciliation with 19-year-old opera sensation Veda (Evan Rachel Wood) proves to be short-lived(n)

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Two strangers become pawns in a diabolical plot and must work together to discover what is really happening while trying to prove that they are not terrorists. Shia LaBeouf ("Disturbia") and Michelle Monaghan star in this taut suspense thriller. Michael Chiklis, Rosario Dawson, Billy Bob Thornton. Directed by D.J. Caruso(n)

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: Adaptation of the TV series set in the 1960s, detailing the first pairing of American agent Napoleon Solo with Russian operative Illya Kuryakin(n)

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: An American/Chinese joint anti-cybertheft task force races to root out an elusive hacker based in Southeast Asia in this Legendary Pictures thriller written, produced, and directed by Michael Mann, and starring Chris Hemsworth(n)

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: Remake of the post-apocalyptic action film, in which Max meets Imperator Furiosa and agrees to help her cross the desert. On the run from Immortan Joe, the two rebels must escape the madness and seek sanctuary(n)

programme.desc: En 1987, cinco jóvenes revolucionan la cultura popular utilizando el arma más poderosa que tenían: su música. Película biográfica sobre la banda estadounidense de rap N. W. A., que encendió una revolución social que aún hoy sigue reverberando. (cc)

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: En el primer episodio, una noche perfecta para un estudiante paquistaní-estadounidense se convierte en una pesadilla cuando es arrestado por asesinato. (cc)

programme.title: Mad Max Fury Road
programme.desc: En un futuro postapocalíptico, el solitario Max se ve atrapado en la difícil situación de un grupo de mujeres guerreras que huyen de un déspota malo a través de un páramo desierto. (cc)

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton

programme.desc: Un agente encubierto (D.B. Sweeney) se hace amigo del ladrón de autos (Charlie Sheen) al cual ha sido asignado a capturar. Lara Harris, Randy Quaid

programme.title: Tío papi
programme.desc: El soltero salvaje Ray Ray Domínguez sueña con nada más que una vida despreocupada de la indulgencia en Miami, pero sus planes cambian abruptamente cuando se convierte en el tutor legal de los seis hijos de su hermana. (cc)

programme.title: Whoopi Goldberg Presents Moms Mabley
programme.desc: Un perfil de Jackie "Moms" Mabley (1894-1975), una estrella del entretenimiento que fue la primer comediante femenina en presentarse en el Teatro Apollo, en Harlem, y más tarde en "The Ed Sullivan Show". El documental cuenta con fotografías de archivo y filmaciones de sus presentaciones. (cc)

programme.title: Princess Kaiulani
programme.desc: En este drama histórico que se desarrolla hacia finales del siglo XIX, una princesa hawaiana lucha para los derechos de su gente tras huir a Inglaterra para escapar el descontento social en su país natal. (cc)

programme.title: El club de los incomprendidos
programme.desc: Valeria, cuyos padres se acaban de separar, debe mudarse a Madrid y matricularse en un instituto nuevo. Aunque al principio no le haga ilusión, Valeria vivirá increíbles nuevas sensaciones, gracias a nuevos amigos, una nueva gran ciudad... Y el primer amor

programme.title: Antwone Fisher
programme.desc: Denzel Washington debuta como director con este drama inspirador, basado en la historia real de un marinero de actitud volátil (Derek Luke) y el psiquiatra compasivo (Washington) que lo ayuda. Adaptada de un guión de Fisher

programme.title: Terence Crawford My Fight
programme.desc: Perfil del boxeador del peso wélter junior, Terence Crawford, antes de su cita con Viktor Postol en Las Vegas el próximo 23 de julio. (cc)

programme.title: Suffragette
programme.desc: En Inglaterra a comienzo del siglo XX, los primeros movimientos feministas luchan por obtener el ansiado derecho al voto. Maud, una joven luchadora de la clase obrera, incurrirá hasta en la violencia para forzar el cambio, poniendo en riesgo su propia vida. Una película basada en la verdadera historia de todas las mujeres corrientes que cambiaron el mundo, sin quebrantar las leyes, solo con la intensión de poder redactarlas y tener voz en un mundo, hasta entonces gobernado por los hombres. (cc)

programme.desc: Ice Cube protagoniza esta comedia sobre un día en la vida de los payasos que trabajan en una peluquería del sur de Chicago, y los que siempre andan por ahí

programme.desc: Ambientada en Grecia, cuenta la vida de una guía turística que tiene que lidiar con un alocado grupo de turistas más interesados en comprar souvenirs que en visitar monumentos. (cc)(n)

programme.desc: Un viudo de 70 años de edad, sale de su retiro para tomar una pasantía en una revista de moda. (cc)(n)

programme.desc: Después de pasar años como empleada doméstica con la misma familia, Rosana tendrá que encargarse de los preparativos para el funeral de la matriarca de la casa. A pesar de haber querido mucho a la abuela fallecida, Rosana se verá relegada debido a su estatus de sirvienta. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
programme.desc: Un empresario decide ampliar su floreciente negocio hotelero cuando una sola vacante deja poco espacio para la variedad de personas mayores excéntricas que buscan un lugar en el mejor exótico hotel Marigold. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Sin hijos
programme.desc: Grabriel, un hombre herido por su separación que ocurrió hace cuatro años, siente que la mejor manera de vivir su vida es centrándose en su hija de ocho años, Sofia, y en su trabajo. Sin embargo, Vicky, un antiguo amor platónico de Gabriel, aparece en su vida. Vicky no quiere iniciar una relación con alguien que tenga hijos por lo que Gabriel se las ingenia para que Vicky no sepa que tiene una hija(n)

programme.title: The making of "Spy"
programme.desc: Una mirada a la producción de "Spy", una comedia 2015 sobre una agente de la CIA infiltrada. La película es protagonizada por Melissa McCarthy, Jason Statham y Rose Byrne, y está escrita y dirigida por Paul Feig. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Namesake
programme.desc: Saga que mira el choque cultural a través de generaciones de una familia de Bengladés que intenta adaptarse a la vida de los EE.UU. Kal Penn, Tabu. Dirigida por Mira Nair. (cc)(n)

programme.desc: Entrevistas a influyentes latinos, estos personajes comparten sus historias y sus fascinantes experiencias como hombres latinos en los Estados Unidos. (cc)(n)

programme.desc: Un vistazo a la producción de "Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials" en la que Thomas, Teresa, y el resto de habitantes se preparan para la segunda fase, después de escapar de la primera prueba. La película es protagonizada por Dylan O'Brien, Kaya Scodelario y Thomas Sangster, y es dirigida por Wes Ball. (cc)(n)

programme.title: María y el araña
programme.desc: María es una chica de trece años que vive en una villa de emergencia de Buenos Aires junto a su abuela y el oscuro compañero de ésta. María conoce a un chico de 17 años que se gana la vida haciendo malabares disfrazado de Hombre Araña. Una relación amorosa empieza a surgir entre ellos y a medida que esto pasa se irán descubriendo los siniestros secretos de la vida de la joven. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Open Your Eyes *
programme.desc: Un mujeriego adinerado que parece tenerlo todo, se ve sumergido en una pesadilla en donde la realidad y la fantasía se mezclan, después de sufrir un accidente que lo deja desfigurado(n)

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: From the Shadows It Watches. Rev. Anderson's powers are tested; Patricia reaches out to Kyle; and Sidney issues a warning

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: Based upon the comic book about a super-secret spy organisation that recruits a streetwise young upstart, and puts him through their vigorous ultra-competitive training program

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: From the Shadows It Watches. Rev. Anderson's powers are tested; Patricia reaches out to Kyle; and Sidney issues a warning

programme.title: Beginner's Guide to Sex
programme.desc: An innocent virgin, Laci Cox is hired to teach a high school students sexual education

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: Set in a dystopian future where infertility has led mankind to the brink of extinction, a sole pregnant woman holds the key to the survival of humanity. In 2027, the world's youngest person has died at the age of 18. Infertility has ravaged the world, leading it into anarchy. Eastern European and African societies have collapsed, causing their remaining populace to flee to England

programme.title: Criminal Activities
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller, four friends get in over their heads when they become indebted to a dangerous crime boss. Now, they must kidnap a beloved member of a rival kingpin's family in order to erase their debt, and do so without getting caught or killed in the process

programme.title: Play Misty for Me
programme.desc: Tense thriller about a radio DJ who becomes the object of a listener's desire that escalates into a fanatical obsession. After a one-night stand, he finds himself pursued by a woman who won't take no for an answer and goes to increasingly drastic lengths to declare her undying love for him. When these fail, her desire is transformed into an uncontrolled bid for revenge. Clint Eastwood's directorial debut

programme.title: Unbroken
programme.desc: The true life tale of Louis Zamperini, the Olympic track star who survived a plane crash in World War II, only to fight for his life against nature and eventually as a prisoner of war

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger woos a young woman and brings her to his mansion atop a clay mountain. There, she learns that her new home holds many disturbing secrets as she fights for her sanity and her very life

programme.title: White Palace
programme.desc: Sharply observed, brilliantly played adaptation of Glenn Savan's unorthodox romantic novel about a young, successful advertising exec who falls deeply in love with an older, slatternly woman. Although they find happiness together in private, their wildly different backgrounds provide plenty of problems in the outside world. Look for author Savan himself in the opening scene as a hamburger chef

programme.title: The Drop
programme.desc: A man working in an illegal scheme funneling cash to the local organised-crime syndicate through "money drops" gets caught in the crossfire of a robbery gone wrong

programme.title: AVPR: Aliens vs Predator---Requiem
programme.desc: A PredAlien hybrid causes a Predator ship to crash, scattering 'facehugger' aliens into a small, unsuspecting town. A Predator arrives from his homeworld to take on the Aliens

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: From the Shadows It Watches. Rev. Anderson's powers are tested; Patricia reaches out to Kyle; and Sidney issues a warning

programme.title: The Glass House
programme.desc: Taut direction and strong performances recommend this first-rate suspense yarn. When their parents are killed, two orphans (Trevor Morgan, Leelee Sobieski) move in with a wealthy and seemingly benevolent couple (Stellan Skarsgard, Diane Lane). But soon the adoptive parents begin to behave in a sinister manner, making the kids' lives a nightmare. Bruce Dern, Kathy Baker

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger woos and transports a young woman to a crumbling dwelling atop a clay mountain, where she soon learns he has many secrets in the haunted mansion that will leave her fighting for her sanity and her very life(r)

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: A university student enters into a sadomasochistic relationship with a businessman, whose desire for extreme intimacy stems from secrets from his past. Based on the best-selling novel by E L James(n)

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage is a burnt-out paramedic once nicknamed Father Frank for his efforts to rescue lives, Frank sees the ghosts of those he failed to save around every turn. He has tried everything he can to get fired - calling in sick, delaying calls when he might have to face another victim he can't help - but he cannot quit the job on his own. Director Martin Scorsese returns to the smoky streets he explored so memorably in the seminal Taxi Driver(n)

programme.title: Proof of Life
programme.desc: Engineer Peter Bowden is snatched by professional terrorists in the South American jungle. While the western hostage negotiators pull out, ex-SAS man Terry Thorne takes the job for Peter's distraught wife Alice. But the rising tension only draws the pair together. A well-made, gripping thriller(n)

programme.title: Barb Wire
programme.desc: A bounty hunter's town and business are under siege by warring factions in this futuristic fantasy about comic-book babe Barb Wire(n)

programme.title: Lorenzo's Oil
programme.desc: Fact-based story of parents seeking a cure for their son's life-threatening illness(n)

programme.title: My Blueberry Nights
programme.desc: Elizabeth has just been through a particularly nasty break-up, and now she's ready to leave her friends and memories behind as she chases her dreams across the U.S. In order to support herself on her journey, Elizabeth picks up a series of waitress jobs along the way. As Elizabeth crosses paths with a series of lost souls whose yearnings are even greater than her own -- including a troubled cop , his estranged wife, and an embittered gambler -- their emotional turmoil ultimately helps her gain a greater understanding of her own problems(n)

programme.title: Murderous Intent
programme.desc: Gripping psychological study delving into the well-constructed murder of an upper-class British schoolboy (Tom Sturridge) by a classmate (Eddie Redmayne). Strangely, evidence suggests that the minds of the two young men may have become one. Toni Collette, who also serves as an executive producer, costars as the forensic psychologist investigating the case who discovers a disturbing connection between the two. Written and directed by Gregory J. Read(n)

programme.title: Unfinished Business
programme.desc: A businessman tries to land a major deal and save his fledging company. To do so, he and two co-workers, one very old and one very young, must take an overseas trip to show their potential customer a wild night on the town(n)

programme.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
programme.desc: Adam Sandler and Kevin James make a hilarious couple in this riotous farce about a widowed firefighter who asks his straight pal to pose as his gay lover so that his kids can receive life-insurance benefits. Jessica Biel, Dan Aykroyd, Ving Rhames, Steve Buscemi. Directed by Dennis Dugan(n)

programme.title: Batman Forever
programme.desc: DA Harvey Dent and vengeful scientist The Riddler plan to take down Batman. The Gotham City superhero is going to need his new partner, boy wonder Robin. But will he be able to cope with the distraction of sexy doc Chase Meridian?(n)

programme.title: Knocked Up

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: 2016 is the BBC's 'Year of the Story' and as part of the celebration, the award winning Horrible Histories returns with a one-off special about Staggering Storytellers. Who wrote the first detective novel? When were books invented? Why do we like stories so much? In its own distinctive and irreverently accurate style, the episode takes a look at some of literature's greatest works and history's wackiest writers. Along the way we see the development of storytelling technology; we learn how a party at Lord Byron's house led to the writing of the Gothic masterpiece Frankenstein, and how Charles Dickens was the Harry Styles of his day. Spanning 3,000 years of recorded history we take a look at the funny and ridiculous ways some of our finest writers cured their writing block - did you know Tennyson used to pretend to go the loo as a party trick? Plus, of course, our trusty host Rattus to guide the way.

programme.title: Gangsta Granny
programme.desc: Family comedy based on the children's novel by David Walliams. Schoolboy Ben is bored witless after being made to stay with his grandma. All she ever wants to do is play Scrabble and eat yucky cabbage soup. But it turns out there's a whole lot more to this OAP than cardigans and toffees when she tells him how she used to be an international jewel thief - and when she admits there was one heist she never quite managed in her heyday, the pair set out on a criminal adventure. Julie McKenzie stars as the shady senior citizen, with Walliams and Miranda Hart as the boys' ballroom-dancing parents, alongside Joanna Lumley, Rob Brydon and none other than Robbie Williams, with Reece Buttery as Ben.
